advancement.worsemaces.apple_mace.descri: Use your harvest to create the Greenest Mace
advancement.worsemaces.apple_mace.title: Keeping the Doctor Away
advancement.worsemaces.brass_bell_mace.d: Use 5 Bells and a heavy core to make a really loud mace
advancement.worsemaces.command_block_mac: Combine all your maces to create the worst mace
advancement.worsemaces.gamblers_mace.des: Gamble your wither skeleton skulls away to make a hopeful mace
advancement.worsemaces.gross_mace.descri: Use the grossest things in Minecraft to make a perfectly good heavy core into a gross mess
advancement.worsemaces.gross_mace.title: Chopped Cheese
advancement.worsemaces.potion_mace.descr: Use any potion to create an effective mace
advancement.worsemaces.potion_mace.title: Heavy Brewery
advancement.worsemaces.pufferfish_mace.d: Destroy the pufferfish population to create a poisonous mace
advancement.worsemaces.root.title: Worse Maces
advancement.worsemaces.tnt_mace.descript: Create, possibly, the best mace of the worst maces
advancement.worsemaces.tnt_mace.title: Now I Have Become Death
advancement.worsemaces.unfinished_mace.d: Smash your heavy core to bits to make it incomplete, then craft it into a mace
advancement.worsemaces.wooden_mace.title: Baby's First Mace
item.worsemaces.apple_mace.tooltip.1: Creates a tree upon killing a mob
item.worsemaces.apple_mace.tooltip.2: Also spawns a few apples when a mob is hit with a smash
A loud mace that stuns enemies
item.worsemaces.command_block_mace.toolt: Smash an enemy to run a random command
Right click a block to place a random block
Right click the air to launch a random mob
item.worsemaces.gamblers_mace.tooltip.1: A mace that can be twice as good as
item.worsemaces.gamblers_mace.tooltip.2: a normal one, but usually isn't
item.worsemaces.gross_mace.tooltip.1: EW! Can turn blocks into slime
item.worsemaces.gross_mace.tooltip.2: and summon slimes on a smash attack
item.worsemaces.potion_mace.tooltip.1: Hitting a mob gives it a random
Creates a cloud of poison when used in a smash attack
Also poisons its target and nearby enemies
item.worsemaces.tnt_mace.tooltip.1: Right click on a block to launch upwards using tnt
item.worsemaces.tnt_mace.tooltip.2: Landing a smash spawns in TNT and killing an enemy with a smash spawns a giant explosion
A mace that has random chances of doing
any given thing a mace normally does
